mapper.sql: id, serial_no, teller_no, teller_name, task_type, remark, create_time, update_time
mapper.insert: insert into person (id, serial_no, teller_no, teller_name, task_type, remark, create_time, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{serialNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tellerNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tellerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update person set serial_no = #{serialNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, teller_no = #{tellerNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, teller_name = #{tellerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, task_type = #{taskType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
